name: autocad-mcp
description: A Model Context Protocol server for AutoCAD 2025 with advanced CAD automation, 3D modeling, and manufacturing capabilities
author: AutoCAD MCP Contributors

tools.name: draw_line
tools.description: Draw a line in AutoCAD between two 3D points

tools.name: draw_circle
tools.description: Draw a circle in AutoCAD with center and radius

tools.name: extrude_profile
tools.description: Create a 3D solid by extruding a 2D profile

tools.name: revolve_profile
tools.description: Create a 3D solid by revolving a profile around an axis

tools.name: unfold_surface
tools.description: Unfold 3D surfaces using advanced algorithms (LSCM, ABF, ARAP)

tools.name: boolean_union
tools.description: Combine multiple 3D solids using boolean union

tools.name: boolean_subtract
tools.description: Subtract solids from a target solid

tools.name: add_linear_dimension
tools.description: Add linear dimensions to AutoCAD drawings

tools.name: batch_surface_unfold
tools.description: Batch process multiple surfaces for unfolding

tools.name: optimize_pattern_nesting
tools.description: Optimize material usage with advanced nesting algorithms

tools.name: list_entities
tools.description: List all entities in the current AutoCAD drawing

tools.name: get_entity_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific entity

tools.name: server_status
tools.description: Check MCP server and AutoCAD connection status

prompts.name: autocad-help
prompts.description: Get help with AutoCAD MCP tools and usage examples

dependencies: AutoCAD 2025 must be installed and running
Windows COM components for AutoCAD automation

steps: Test server with: uv run python src/server.py
